name: Santafactsforkids
0:
”Alexa, open Santa facts!”
”Alexa, open Santa facts and give me a fact!”
”Alexa, open Santa facts and tell me something!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa facts
des: How fast would Santa have to travel to visit every house? How much time does He have to deliver the gifts? How many reindeers does He have? Does Santa has other names? Ask Alexa to know more about Santa Claus!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
